item.description: Get your domain on your business card! Nivel Hosting Nivel Hosting allows you to have a professional presence on the web. Communicate with a professional email. Don’t give your customer or partners your the dave451@gmail.com email no more! You can have emails with your own domains. Nivel Mail Email with your own domain Hosting of your static site 20 email addresses, eg contact@yourdomain.gh Customer support Included Nivel Web Create your business static website quickly with 4 pages:
